name: Careless Jamal
description:
This game was created for GlobalGameJam2022 and Is a experimental game.

“Careless Jamal” always has his head down checking social media on his mobile phone, distracted while walking his way back home. There is a dangerous world out there and Jamal can not care less!

We should help Jamal by changing the world around him, letting him return home safely.

In this game we control the world with 3 cards, with “1”, “2” and “3” keys on the keyboard. One for temperature making Ice to Lava and Lava to Ice, One for Day and Night and one to move movable platforms Up and Down.

To run on Mac you should give permission to the file manually. To do so move to Mac folder via Terminal, then:

`$ chmod +x CarelessJamal.app/Contents/MacOS/Careless Jamal`

`$ xattr -r -d com.apple.quarantine CarelessJamal.cpp`
